subject: multithreaded datacentric junit
msgSnippet: Hi! I want to loadtest an application while separating test data from the actual test code. junitpp for example, does pretty much what I want but its
messageBody:
Hi!

I want to loadtest an application while separating test data from the
actual test code. junitpp for example, does pretty much what I want
but its testrunner doesnt support test data per thread, nor does the
testrunner have proper ant support. I need to have different test data
for each test thread. This must be a common problem, yet I fail to
find a suitable junit extention. Can anyone point me in the right
direction, BR Niklas.
